card.name: Milo Burrows
card.text: Unique. Cannot be controlled by a Hobbit. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site.

card.name: Nob
card.text: Unique. May not be among the starting characters, and may only be brought into play at his home site. Nob costs no direct influence to control, if controlled by Barliman Butterbur or a Hobbit. tap: tap a face-up agent at his current or new site.

card.name: Sancho Proudfoot
card.text: Unique. +1 to his burglary attempts. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site.

card.name: Taurnil
card.text: Unique. Nando. -2 prowess against Animals and Awakened Plants. +2 prowess against Orcs.

card.name: Ted Sandyman
card.text: Unique. Agent. May not be among the starting characters, unless you start the game at Bag End. May only be brought into play at his home site (regardless of any other card effects). Unless you are a Dwarf-lord or Gandalf, Mischief in a Mean Way is playable on his current site in The Shire (as if on a Border-hold [B]). Agent only: +2 EI against Hobbits.
